amendment.description: To express the Sense of the Senate concerning recent provocative actions by the Peoples Republic of China and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 283 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S3190; text: CR S3190) To express the Sense of the Senate concerning recent provocative actions by the Peoples Republic of China and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 283 proposed by Senator Dodd.
